programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown | In Cold Flood
programme.desc: Floods give way to rainbows and tornadoes twist into hailstorms on today’s intense Extreme Weather Countdown!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.desc: From the intense to the unusual to the just plain wacky, Extreme Weather Countdown is home to everything the elements have to offer, and it's time for an all-new episode. We'll work our way through snow, wind, fog, lightning, and more, so fasten your seatbelts and let's get started.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: From storm clouds to northern lights, high winds to meteor showers, chaos reigns in the skies.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: Experience the devastation wrought by calamities and the havoc they wreak

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Jaclyn joins Mark in a ride through the US Midwest during the most prolific tornado season on record.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: It’s exhilarating. It’s heart-wrenching. Mark and other storm hunters dive head first into some of the most destructive and deadly hurricanes to hit the US mainland in this millennium.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: A mysterious fever overwhelms Mark as he struggles to fulfil a childhood dream. He must use every ounce of inner strength to journey to the mouth of hell, and make it out alive.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Storm Chaser Jaclyn Whittal anxiously experiences her first Category 4 Tropical Storm.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: “Angry Planet” is there as 3 storms make landfall as hurricanes in the US.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George surfs with the “Hawaian Fire” firefighters.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: One of the most exciting episodes of season one is “Wild Water” – our look at Great White Sharks, water-filled caves and high voltage marine action.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: Angry Planet | Java - Land of Fire
programme.desc: Geoorge explores Java at the heart of the Ring of Fire.
